description: This table contains information about orders associated with requisitions and cases.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order records that are associated with the requisition.

columns.name: ORDER_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The order group ID is used to group together tests that were ordered as part of the same order or orderable panel. This item is primarily used for billing purposes to verify that all tests ordered as part of an order or panel are complete so that billing can be triggered at the order or panel level.
